meanings.definition: A tuft of feathers, especially the ornamental head plume of a bird.
meanings.sent1: The majestic peacock displayed a vibrant aigret on its head.
meanings.sent2: The aigret of the swan added elegance to its appearance.
meanings.sent3: The aigret of the ostrich made it look like it was wearing a fancy hat.
meanings.sent4: Her aigret of golden feathers shimmered in the sunlight like a crown.
meanings.sent5: The aigret of the bird was so fluffy and soft, like a tiny cloud perched on its head.
